description: Lentils adds lots of plant protein to classic shakshuka and make it a filling option for any time of the day.
name: Lentil & Kale Shakshuka Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large nonstick pan on medium heat and cook the onions for 6-8 minutes. Add the mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, kale and garam masala and cook for 5 minutes, until the kale has wilted.

Stir in the lentils and cook for 2 minutes to heat through. Make 4 wells in the sauce and crack in the eggs. Place a lid on the pan and cook on low for 6 minutes, or until the yolk is runny but the whites have set.
Serve with chopped coriander scattered on top.
